#id=1
#text=All week long my family had been adding to a list on our refrigerator .
#id=2
#text=Sometimes they wrote down what food they wanted , and sometimes it was food we had run out of .
#id=3
#text=Today was Saturday , the day I always go grocery shopping .
#id=4
#text=After putting the list and a pen in my pocket , I drove to the store and parked next to a light so that I would be able to find it later .
#id=5
#text=On my way into the store I took a shopping cart , because the list was very long !
#id=6
#text=The produce section is by the door , and I piled broccoli , apples , oranges , and carrots into individual plastic bags , using wire ties to keep the bags closed .
#id=7
#text=Then I pushed my cart up and down the aisles , adding Kix cereal , Pop Tarts , cans of soup , crackers , bread and cookies to the cart .
#id=8
#text=Last was the refrigerated section , where I picked up milk and eggs .
#id=9
#text=As I went , I crossed items off the list .
#text=When everything was crossed off I waited in a line until a cashier rang up my items and put them in bags .
#text=After paying , I put all the bags into the back of my car and went home .
